title: No Food Waste
description: Take only what you can consume. Avoid wasting food and help reduce unnecessary waste.

title: Maintain Silence
description: Speak softly and avoid loud conversations to respect the quiet study environment.

title: Silence is Golden
description: Keep noise to a minimum. Use the space for quiet reflection or meditation only.

title: Clean Up After Eating
description: Leave the dining area clean. Dispose of leftovers and wrappers in the proper bins.

title: Valid Passport with Visa
description: Please bring valid passport and visa while go for SSN Interview
